Html: I have a simple wcf referenced in the shell which I need to provide access to all the modules. What is the simplest way to achieve this. Thanks.

Hi,

One possibility would be to add the WCF service reference in an infrastructure project and make all your modules reference it.

You might find the following threads useful, as they deal with similar scenarios:

  • How to create the optimal infrastructure?
  • Configuring Unity Container with Service that calls WCF service

You could also check the following blog post, which provides guidance on how to use WCF services with Prism in Silverlight:

Using WCF services in Prism Silverlight applications

I hope you find this helpful.
